00006 int main() {
00007     
00008     Sym c1 = SymConst(0.4);
00009     Sym c2 = SymConst(0.3);
00010     Sym v1 = SymVar(0);
00011 
00012     Sym expr = (c1 + c2) * ( (c1 + c2) * v1);
00013     
00014     cout << expr << endl;
00015     cout << simplify(expr) << endl;

00019     cout << simplify(dv) << endl;
